title: Comparing Mobile and Desktop Instructional Design Difficulty: Short-Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theory and ADDIE model comprehension, with domain experience in language education
context.additional_context: Practical course for developing mobile/desktop content for workplace language education

learning_goals: Accurately explain design differences between mobile/desktop environments for each ADDIE model phase with over 80% precision
Develop two or more language learning contents reflecting mobile device constraints (internet connectivity, etc.)
Propose three or more improvements for mobile/desktop learning contents based on formative assessment results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
